Arcane Researcher

You’ve invested a considerable amount of time researching matters of the arcane. You might have studied under the tutelage of a master of magic or alchemy, or you might have devoted yourself to uncovering lost secrets of the mystical arts.

Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 1. Your Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, or Constitution increases by 1.

Arcane Practice. You can cast Detect Magic and Identify with this feature. Once you cast either spell, you can’t cast that spell again with this feature until you finish a short or long rest. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.TP11O686JVJLQIAR]{Arcane Practice}

Skills. Choose one from: Arcana, History, Nature, Religion

Languages. One of your choice.

Other. You gain proficiency with alchemist’s supplies or an extra language.
